item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, September 24, 2024 at 8:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Beyond the route: Introducing granular MTA bus speed data (48 points | 4 comments)
2. Show HN: OpenFreeMap – Open-Source Map Hosting (502 points | 149 comments)
3. Launch HN: Modern Realty (YC S24) – AI Real Estate Agent for Home Buyers (72 points | 148 comments)
4. Death of the Department Store (15 points | 7 comments)
5. Move Fast and Abandon Things (255 points | 87 comments)
6. GSoC'24: Differentiable Logic for Interactive Systems and Generative Music (31 points | 2 comments)
7. Winamp Legacy player source code (490 points | 224 comments)
8. Attracting and Retaining Debian Contributors (93 points | 60 comments)
9. Neat Randomized Algorithms: RandDiag for Rapidly Diagonalizing Normal Matrices (25 points | 2 comments)
10. Show HN: JSON For You – Visualize JSON in graph or table views (116 points | 21 comments)
11. Fully documented source code for Lander on the Acorn Archimedes (131 points | 32 comments)
12. The Quest to Build a Telescope on the Moon (100 points | 55 comments)
13. "Creounity Time Machine", the universal date converter for coin collectors (18 points | discuss)
14. Jetstream: Shrinking the AT Protocol Firehose by >99% (128 points | 85 comments)
15. 45 years ago CompuServe connected the world before the World Wide Web (75 points | 62 comments)
16. Wasm2Mpy: Compiling WASM to MicroPython so it can run on Raspberrys (9 points | 1 comment)
17. DOJ accuses Visa of debit network monopoly, impacts price of 'nearly everything' (120 points | 56 comments)
18. In 1870, Lord Rayleigh used oil and water to calculate the size of molecules (524 points | 182 comments)
19. OpenBSD now enforcing no invalid NUL characters in shell scripts (135 points | 114 comments)
20. Maker Pipe – Structural Pipe Fittings for DIY Builders (206 points | 108 comments)
21. Show HN: I Wrote a Book on Java (552 points | 151 comments)
22. Giving T cells extra batteries supercharges them against cancer (139 points | 64 comments)
23. The New York Times will now charge for past episodes of its popular podcasts (3 points | 1 comment)
24. Radioactive Tape Dispenser (1970s) (74 points | 42 comments)
25. Tracy: A real time, nanosecond resolution frame profiler (158 points | 26 comments)
26. I designed a Dieter Rams-inspired iPhone dock (1424 points | 334 comments)
27. Two new Gemini models, reduced 1.5 Pro pricing, increased rate limits, and more (148 points | 94 comments)
28. What, Me Worry? The Art and Humor of Mad Magazine (227 points | 108 comments)
29. One Collatz Coincidence (73 points | 22 comments)
30. We fine-tuned Llama 405B on AMD GPUs (449 points | 85 comments)
